thread.title: Asante Kotoko yet to receive their share of Baba Rahman's move to Chelsea
thread.title_full: Asante Kotoko yet to receive their share of Baba Rahman's move to Chelsea

title: Asante Kotoko yet to receive their share of Baba Rahman's move to Chelsea
text:
12:55 CET Asante Kotoko yet to receive their share of Baba Rahman's move to Chelsea - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana and former Asante Kotoko defender Baba Rahman 
Asante Kotoko SC is yet to receive their share of $ 57,000 as development fee from Baba Rahman's move to Chelsea. 
Kotoko, who gave the player the needed exposure three years ago, are expected to receive $ 57,000 as training compensation and solidarity contribution, courtesy FIFA's International Transfer Matching System (ITMS). 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
